title: Goodnight Stories
description: From back Here is a delightful assortment of 27 bedtime tales, written by the most loved of children's authors, Enid Blyton. These specially chosen stories are filled with fun, magic and make-believe. Young readers will find witches and wizards, pixies and fairies, talking cats and dogs and even toys that come to life. They were written between the years of 1943 and 1953 and are accompanied by beautiful color illustrations throughout. Enchanting.......
author: Enid Blyton
